entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story, mentioned as 'it's a start, Harry' and 'he opened the door and slid inside'. He is also referred to by Professor Sprout as 'Ten points to Gryffindor'.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being between Harry and Hermione in the greenhouse.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as raising her hand to answer Professor Sprout's question about Mandrake properties.

entities.name: professor sprout
entities.description: Professor Sprout is the teacher in charge of the greenhouse lesson. She is described as standing behind a trestle bench and giving instructions to Harry, Ron, and Hermione.

entities.name: mandrake
entities.description: Mandrake is mentioned as being used for re-potting in the greenhouse lesson. Professor Sprout asks about its properties.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is mentioned as receiving ten points from Professor Sprout after Hermione answers her question correctly.

relationships.description: Harry receives points from Professor Sprout for Gryffindor house.
Hermione answers Professor Sprout's question about Mandrake properties.
